result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert William Klubertanz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in custody.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states cases and parties state appearances.  Atty O'Rourke notes she and DE rec/rev revocation summary.  State states agreement.  Atty O'Rourke agrees.  DE makes statement.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

14CF154
90 days jail w/huber consecutive to sentence in 14CF208 and any other sentence to commence forthwith
51 days credit
Unpaid court obligations to be converted to civil judgments

60 days jail w/huber consecutive to sentence in 14CF154 and any other sentence
25 days credit
Unpaid court obligations to be converted to civil judgments
Sentencing hearing on revocation at 10-26-2015 10:30 am
Sentencing hearing on revocation at 11-20-2015 03:30 pm

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in court with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amend to misd. bail 946.49(1)(a).   Attorney ORourke gives recommendation.  State agrees as noted.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 1:
18 months Probation, concurrent.
Undergo any counseling per agent.
AODA & treatment
Anger management and domestic abuse counseling.
$243.00 costs & $200.00 DNA surcharge & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in court with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading.    Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial Br. 3.

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz in court with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 3.  State request argn date.  Bond continues.  Arraignment scheduled for August 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on July 24, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Return date on July 23, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Robert William Klubertanz appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Michael X Albrecht appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does qualify.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State request $500.00 cash bond with no contact with J.G.  State gives criminal history.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Attorney ORourke request signature bond.   Time limits waived. $300.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with J.G.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 11, 2014 at 08:45 am.  Return date scheduled for July 23, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
